review: I would recommend Dr Jeff for any bones or spine related issues. I had stiff neck and hip pain for long time. After initial treatment at different hospital, it still did not cure. Then Dr Jeff was referred by my friend. Met him after the initial x ray he wanted to make sure that best treatment is provided. He suggested few test and MRI for detailed examination. He is an excellent ortho doctor. Thank you doc. Stay blessed 🙂

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Title: Remarkable Recovery from Frozen Shoulder

I recently visited Dr. Jeff Walter to seek treatment for my wife's frozen shoulder condition. After a thorough examination, he prescribed minimal medication for seven days followed by a tailored set of exercises. Over the course of six months of dedication to the exercise regimen, my wife experienced a remarkable recovery.

Initially, my wife was unable to move her right hand from the shoulder to the elbow due to the stiffness and pain associated with frozen shoulder. However, thanks to Dr. Jeff Walter's treatment plan and her commitment to the exercises, she has made significant progress. She can now lift both her hands fully, indicating a complete recovery from the condition.

I am truly impressed by the expertise and care provided by Dr. Jeff Walter. His accurate diagnosis, minimal medication approach, effective treatment plan, and personalized exercise routine have brought about life-changing improvements for my wife. I highly recommend Dr. Jeff Walter to anyone seeking treatment for shoulder-related issues.

review:
My uncle had a really bad case of frozen shoulder, making it hard for him to sleep well or go about his daily activities. The pain was intense. We saw Dr. Jeff, and he suggested a hydrodilatation procedure. After that, my uncle's shoulder is back to normal, and he's using his arm without any pain or issues.

What stands out about Dr. Jeff is his genuine empathy for his patients. He takes the time to explain the problem, the possible solutions, and the best option based on the patient's age and condition. Throughout the whole process, he treated us like family. If you need an orthopedic specialist, Dr. Jeff is the one to trust. I highly recommend him to anyone reading this.

On the first examination on my knee intself he told me that you have several ligament tears so we have to do acl reconstruction. I was scared and felt depressed. Dr.jeff and his politness, approach kind nature care towards me gave me ton of confidence. Even the day before surgery he had been with me almost 3 hours. Explaining how he is going to operate, what are the excercises that will make me able to walk and run again etc. He is full of life and positivity. I am now seeing him as a brother. review: Dr. Jeff is so friendly. He is a patient listener. I have visited his clinic several times for  bone problems, skin problems and few other common health issues. He never neglects any minor symptoms and always questions to find out the root cause of the problem, which helps for accurate disease identification and treatment. He  explains the problem / health issue in a simple, easy to understand manner. His accurate problem diagnosis ability, prescription of recent medicines, suggesting essential simple exercises and positive advice helped my recovery easy and faster. Waiting time in his clinic is between 05 to 30 minutes depending on the number of patients and their issues. From my experience, I have recommend Dr. Jeff Walter to my friends and they also felt happy with his ability to accurately identify problems and treatment. In future also I will recommend this doctor to my family, friends and known circle.
